knimeNode.name: Secondary Forecaster
knimeNode.shortDescription: Predicts the growth / inactivation rate of bacteria based on previously estimated secondary models.

fullDescription.intro: This node uses secondary models from the database to predict changes in growth rates due to temperature, pH and / or aw, depending on input settings.

ports.inPort: A data table array which consists of the output of the properly configured Load Related Data node, merged via the Table Array Merger with a table of input values created by the Table Creator node (which is part of the basic KNIME installation, not this BfR plugin). The created table has to follow a special form, described in the plugin's manual.
ports.outPort: A table array consisting of only one table, which contains the user-specified input variables as well as the predicted values for each specified model. This table can be extracted with an appended Table Array Splitter node.
